About

Tough tackler and strong physically. Very vocal, dictate the pace of the game. Goal scoring midfielder.
Enjoy a perfectly timed slide tackle or an inch perfect through ball just as much as scoring a goal.

University Team

Participated in BUCS (British Universities & Colleges Sport) league 2014-2015.

  • Date: 2014-2015

NUBS Captain

Captain of NUBS football team (Newcastle University Business School). Led the team to win in a 5-a-side tournament. Finished runners-up once in a 5-a-side and 7-a-side tournament.

  • Date: 2014-2015

University Medals

4 University football medals in 3 years

  • Date: 2012-2015

Gothia Cup

Represented a team from India at the Gothia Cup 2011 – The World Youth Championship held in Gothenburg, Sweden. Participated in the U19 category aged 16. Was also the vice-captain of the team (2011)

  • Date: 2011

Captain of AFC

Captain of Apollo FC , local amateur football team in Hyderabad.

  • Date: 2010 - present
